name: The Hunted Duck - Swamp Duck Hunter Pro
name_original: The Hunted Duck - Swamp Duck Hunter Pro
description: The sniper duck hunters are trying to skeet shoot you out of the sky. Now we have a great twist on duck hunt games! Your now playing the hunt from the ducks point of view. Try to escape the duck hunters as they try to shoot you from the sky. Four cool duck skins to choose from. If you don't like hunting and fishing games show this duck hunter he's not shooting any ducks today! Good duck game for all ages, young kids or adults.
